Nothing without motorcycle!

The most expensive motors!

We are sure that we will be delighted with this text by bikers like those who like motorcycles, that is, motors. Below we bring you the texts that are the most expensive motors in the world ...

Of course, it would be nice if some of us could afford such a luxurious fortune on two wheelss, so that after they tell us their impressions. However, the price is an important factor in all this, so we will be left with our words and pictures ...

  • MV-Augusta F4CC $ 120.000

    • This motorcycle was designed by Claudio Castillon, all in the desire to create something commercially and uniquely. The engine carrying its initials reaches a speed of 315 kilometers per hour, and the bodywork is made of platinum.

  • MTT Turbine SuperBike – $ 150.000

    • This engine is one of the most expensive and recorded in the Ginis's record book for the fastest and most powerful engine in the world. The MTT Turbine SuperBike turbocharger was built in cooperation with Rolls Royce, and besides standard gadgets, this turbo engine has built-in cameras and LCD color a screen for safer driving, a "Smart Start" ignition and a bunch of other interesting things, which makes it very popular among Hollywood stars ...

  • Icon Sheene - $ 160.000

    • This engine was created by Andrew Morris in honor of the legendary British Grand Prix motorcycle champion Beri Shine who died in his 52. For this reason, only 52 models will be produced, each of which meets the unique requirements of the customer.

  • Macchia Nera concept bike – $ 201.000

    • Designed when and Ducati 998RS, with this motorcycle, Italian designers and engineers began to create technologically serious and costly motors in order to win the leading position in the motor industry. Equipped with lightweight metals and alloys such as aluminum and titanium, which makes it quite lightweight. The covers and components are not hidden, but the top-of-the-line design makes it truly aesthetically pleasure.

  • Ecosse Titanium Series RR Limited Edition – $ 275,000

    • This luxury motorcycle has a titanium body with bodywork and carbon fiber wheels. Its seat is ergonomically adjustable, has a fuel-injection system with internal cooling, and a special detail is the built-in watch of the exclusive French watchmaker BRM. There are only 10 models of this engine.

  • Dodge Tomahawk V10 Superbike – $ 555,000

    • Reproduction of Dodge's concept of the "automotive sculpture" engine, let's just say that this Dodge engine is not legally allowed for a public drive. The 8-liter and 10-cylinder engine is fitted with this motor beast up to 100 kilometers in just 2.5 seconds ! Maximum speed Dodge Tomahawk reaches an incredible 400 kilometers an hour!
